description: This table extracts task information associated with a customer service record.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the customer service communication record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TASK_CRM_OWNER_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the task is assigned to the customer service communication's owner.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
